title: "A Christmas Story" movie font?
content:
Hey all,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203930im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ACSCDSDTRK_3819.jpg)

I found a reply on this board from a few years ago that suggested Bookman Bold Swash. Is there a closer match out there? I'm trying to get it as exact as possible.

THANK YOU!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ACSCDSDTRK.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203930/http:/typophile.com/files/ACSCDSDTRK.jpg) | 30.75 KB |
author: ophello

comments.content: No, Bookman is the best match, bearing in mind that the header has had PhotoShop work done on it along with some design modification.

Totally agree with George. And if you're seeking for some numerous alternate swashes, I strongly recommend [Bookmania](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203930/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania) by Mark Simonson. Check the [impressive glyph palette](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203930/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/bold-italic/glyphs.html).
